about.title: About me
about.text: I am a passionate frontend and web developer focused on modern, performant and user-friendly web applications.

facts.location: Kufstein, Tyrol – open to remote work
facts.mindset: Curious, open to new technologies and continuous improvement
facts.approach: Analytical, solution-oriented and detail-focused – with emphasis on quality, performance and UX

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.p1: I work with modern frontend technologies and focus on clean structure, performance, and user-friendly UI/UX.
skills.p2: I see new tools not as a hurdle but as a chance — I keep learning and adapt quickly.

cta.title: You need another
cta.text: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding my knowledge.

growth.hint: I have a special interest in learning

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here — interact with projects to see my skills in action.

items.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using drag & drop, assign users and categories.
items.pollo: Jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa.
items.pokedex: Interactive Pokédex app built with the public Pokémon API. Browse, search and explore with dynamic loading, clean UI and responsive design.

references.title: What my colleagues say about me

items.0: Milos has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.
items.1: I had the good fortune of working with Milos in a group project. He stayed calm, focused, and made sure our team was set up for success.
items.2: Strong communication, clean implementation, and a great sense for UI/UX details. I’d happily work with him again.
items.3: Very structured and reliable. Milos helped keep the project on track and supported the team whenever needed.
items.4: Great technical understanding and fast execution. Milos delivers clean code and communicates clearly.

imprint.title: Legal Notice
imprint.subtitle: Information and disclosure according to § 5 (1) ECG, § 25 MedienG, § 63 GewO and § 14 UGB
imprint.website: Private portfolio website showcasing projects and skills in web development. No online shop, no paid services via this website.
imprint.liabilityContent: The contents of this website were created with the greatest possible care. However, no guarantee is given for the correctness, completeness or timeliness of the content.
imprint.liabilityLinks: This website contains links to external third‑party websites over whose content I have no control. Therefore, I assume no liability for these external contents. At the time of linking, no violations were apparent.
imprint.copyright: The contents of this website are subject to copyright to the extent legally possible. Any use or distribution of material prohibited by copyright requires the author’s written consent.
imprint.odr: Consumers can use the EU Commission's platform for online dispute resolution:
imprint.credits: Own graphics, project screenshots and, if applicable, royalty‑free assets.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.general: Protecting your personal data is important to me. I process data only on the basis of legal provisions (in particular GDPR and TKG 2003).
privacy.logs: When visiting this website, the hosting provider automatically collects information (e.g. IP address, date and time, accessed page/file, data transfer amount, browser/version, operating system and referrer URL).
privacy.logsLegal: Processing is carried out to ensure technical operation, error analysis and protection against misuse/attacks. Legal basis is Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest).
privacy.contact: If you contact me by email or via the contact form, your details are processed to handle the request. Data is not shared without your consent.
privacy.contactLegal: Legal bases: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (pre-contractual measures/communication) and Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in efficient communication).
privacy.contactRetention: Retention for inquiries: generally up to 6 months, unless statutory obligations require otherwise.
privacy.cookies: This website may use cookies. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that do not cause any harm. They help make the site more user-friendly.
privacy.cookiesControl: You can configure your browser to inform you about the setting of cookies and allow this only on a case-by-case basis. Disabling cookies may restrict functionality.

purposes.1: Technical operation, security and stability of the website

privacy.rightsIntro: You have the following rights in particular:
privacy.complaint: If you believe that the processing of your data violates data protection law, you can lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority.
privacy.authority:
Austrian Data Protection Authority (DSB)
Barichgasse 40–42, 1030 Vienna
Phone: +43 1 52 152-0
Email: dsb@dsb.gv.at
privacy.links: This website may contain links to external websites (e.g. GitHub, LinkedIn). When clicking a link, the privacy policies of the respective providers apply. I have no influence on their content or processing.
privacy.retention: Personal data is stored only as long as necessary for the respective purposes or as required by statutory retention obligations.
privacy.changes: I may update this privacy policy when needed (e.g. due to new features or legal changes). The current version on this page applies.

cookie.text: This website uses only technically necessary cookies.
